categories: Category:Sith of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: Melkor Dinn was a male Human Sith of the reconstituted Sith Empire. During the Galactic War he was posted on Taris as chief interrogator. While on Taris, he captured a Republic scientist, Mola Haxtor, and interrogated her about the Force-using Nekghouls in order to use them against the Galactic Republic.
